scripts.docs: javadoc -private -splitindex -d ./docs -classpath apps/chess/assets:apps/chess/src:libs/controller/src:libs/api/src:libs/model/src:libs/view/src:repository/thm/pis/controlp5/0.0.1/controlp5-0.0.1.jar:repository/thm/pis/processing/0.0.1/processing-0.0.1.jar --source-path apps/chess/assets:apps/chess/src:libs/controller/src:libs/api/src:libs/model:src:libs/view:src apps/chess/src/chess/*.java libs/view/src/view/*.java libs/model/src/model/*.java libs/controller/src/controller/*.java libs/api/src/api/controller/*.java libs/api/src/api/view/*.java libs/api/src/api/model/*.java
scripts.fmt: pnpm fmt:xml && pnpm fmt:java && pnpm nx format --all
